title: fatsoman the obesity person of obesity
body:
once a mortal fatass chef, he is mad that some donkey stole his cookbook and will not rest until they are reunited...

passive obesity: every attack adds 1 stack of obesity slowing the enemy down 1%

Q:rotten taco
feeds target a taco causing them to burst into flames dealing 80/100/120/160/200 true damage over 10 seconds applying 1 stack of obesity

W:Fatness: suddenly swells up dealing 1/2/3/4/5% per second to targets nearby

E:HAMBURGER CHEESEBURGER LETTUCE AND SOME SHIT:feeds target so much food that the target's bellygrows so big it starts to intimidate enemies nearby and if they remain close to the target for 5 seconds, they are stunned and dealt 100/130/160/190/250
physical damage.

R: OVERFEED!: feeds so much food to the target that the target explodes. K.O. full stop.

also {{champion:432}} is fat

(this was made for fun riot so yh no offence was intended so soz if i offended u)
